name: Game Showcase
author: Erik Saulnier

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/game-showcase directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.2.3

  • Fixing showcase dropdown selection on game edit screen
  • Fixing search to search game titles in addition to author and description
  • Minor changes to filter widget

1.2.1

  • Games less than 60 days old are now marked as ‘New’ automatically

1.2

  • Updating search widget to search game metadata
  • Adding ‘New’ and ‘In Development’ flag options for games

1.1

  • Filter sidebar widget for searching games

1.0

  • Custom post type for games
  • Taxonomies for game genres and showcases
sections.description: Adds the ability to showcase games on your site.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/game-showcase directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

short_description: Adds the ability to showcase games on your site.
description: Adds the ability to showcase games on your site.
